data.title: 4D Movie Theater - B & B Theatres
data.meta_description: MX4D is the newest evolution in the 4D cinema experience & provides a totally immersive environment, where you actually "feel" the action on the screen from the built-in motion and effects in the seats and theatre around you.
data.text:
This unique motion and special effects in the MX4D® Motion EFX Theatre experience immerses you into the on-screen action like never before. Please be aware of the following regarding the motion and effects experience you are about to enjoy.

Throughout the movie your seat will move with the action on the screen

Please remain seated with your feet on top of the footrest during the entire movie

If you need to get in or out of your seat, please exercise caution and care as your seat and the seats around you may be moving

You must be at least 40" tall and be able to sit and support yourself to enjoy this experience

Please only 1 person per seat, no lap sitting allowed

This experience may not be appropriate for people who may be pregnant, have heart, back, head, leg or neck conditions, or other physical limitations, or those that may have reactions to scents, fog, or strobe lighting effects

If you have any questions or concerns about this MX4D® Motion EFX Theatre, please contact theatre management staff before the movie begins.

Now find your seat, sit back, relax and get ready to enjoy a movie experience like no other in the MX4D® Motion EFX Theatre.
